name: cheesemaker
content:

Add to word list
a person or company that makes cheese: We tried a beautiful aged goat cheese from a local cheesemaker. An accomplished cheese-maker, she married a local dairy farmer. This is an organic cheesemaker that creates products from its own cow and buffalo herds.
More examplesFewer examplesFarmers' markets give you the chance to meet someone who produces food, whether it's an artisan cheesemaker or a vegetable grower. We have twenty employees plus our head cheesemaker, who has been here for sixteen years. This cow is a useful milk producer for the small-scale farmhouse cheese-maker.The cheese is orange-yellow because the cheesemaker adds beta-carotene to it.They are a family-run cheesemaker whose products have won many awards.Cheese makers, bread bakers and beer brewers are artisans too.
